TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataListDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider, class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataListDesigner Inherits TemplatedControlDesigner Implements IDataBindingSchemaProvider, IDataSourceProvider
type BaseDataListDesigner = class inherit TemplatedControlDesigner interface IDataBindingSchemaProvider interface IDataSourceProvider

summary.span: 為衍生自 類別之 Web 伺服器控制項的設計工具主應用程式內，提供設計階段支援的元件，提供基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在設計工具主應用程式，當使用者從來源切換至 [設計] 檢視中，描述控制項的標記來源程式碼衍生自抽象類別會經過剖析，而在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當使用者切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項將保存到標記來源的程式碼中，並編輯網頁的標記。When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 抽象類別可做為衍生自的控制項提供設計階段支援的元件的基底類別為在設計工具主應用程式。The abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the in a designer host. 類別屬性會提供下列功能：The class properties provide the following functionality: 屬性會傳回物件，其中通常包含物件衍生自繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級的設計工具中的類別。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - ， ， ，和屬性可存取之關聯控制項的對應屬性。The , , , and properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control. - 屬性會提供存取至關聯控制項的資料來源的設計工具。The property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control. 屬性會取得資料來源的預設檢視。The property gets the default view of the data source. 類別方法提供下列功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法準備檢視、 編輯和設計關聯的控制項設計工具。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 方法會叫用控制項的元件編輯器。The method invokes a component editor for the control. 方法用來新增、 移除或遮蔽關聯控制項的設計階段屬性。The method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control. - 方法會產生可用來當做資料來源在設計階段的物件。The method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time. 方法會從關聯控制項的容器取得資料來源。The method gets the data source from the container of the associated control. 方法會從控制項容器，解析為特定資料成員取得的資料來源。The method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member. 方法取得樣板容器的資料來源。The method gets the data source of the template container. - 至相關聯的控制項變更時，會呼叫方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. 關聯的控制項的資料來源已變更時呼叫方法。The method is called when the associated control data source has changed. 關聯的控制項的資料來源的結構描述變更時，所呼叫方法。The method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes. 已套用自動格式化配置時，呼叫方法。The method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied. - 和可以覆寫方法實作相關聯的控制項樣式變更時，或設計工具的樣板編輯動作變更時，分別應產生的功能。The and methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively. 方法會處理屬性產生器的事件。The method handles the property-builder event.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別建立關聯的控制項是衍生自時類別或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class or a copy of that control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定設計工具屬性會導致設定關聯控制項的屬性。Setting the designer's property causes the property of the associated control to be set. 如果設定為，表示新的資料來源，必須定義**建立資料來源**對話方塊隨即出現。If the is set to a , indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed. 如果設定為指出沒有資料來源，設為空字串 ("")。If the is set to a indicating there is no data source, the is set to an empty string ("").

summary.span: 在關聯的控制項有變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when there is a change to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，會呼叫衍生自控制項事件類別會執行。The method is called when the event of a control that is derived from the class executes. 一般而言，這是以回應在控制項上屬性變更時 (例如**屬性**方格變更)。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 如果控制項所繫結的物件變更時，在設計介面上重新繪製控制項時。If the object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnDataSourceChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnDataSourceChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 當關聯控制項的資料來源已經變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相關聯的控制項衍生自的基底方法連接類別目前的資料來源，以及如果控制項已連接資料來源不同，此方法來更新設計階段標記。The base method connects the associated control that is derived from the class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void OnPropertyBuilder (object sender, EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig instance void OnPropertyBuilder(object sender, class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Sub OnPropertyBuilder (sender As Object, e As EventArgs)
protected: void OnPropertyBuilder(System::Object ^ sender, EventArgs ^ e);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: An that is the source of the event.

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的 物件。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理屬性產生器事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the property-builder event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會叫用的元件編輯器給關聯控制項衍生自類別。The method invokes a component editor for the associated control that is derived from the class. 它會建立或是物件，然後再叫用的元件編輯器的方法。It creates a or object, and then invokes the method of the component editor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed
abstract member OnSchemaRefreshed : unit -> unit override this.OnSchemaRefreshed : unit -> unit

summary.span: 當關聯控制項的資料來源結構描述變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具處於樣板編輯模式或欄位，除非是要加入或編輯方法呼叫方法，再呼叫方法來更新以反映資料來源變更的控制項。Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig instance void OnStylesChanged() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 可加以覆寫，以實作關聯控制項的樣式變更時應該產生的功能。

span.span: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以做為通知的相關聯的樣式控制項，衍生自類別已變更。The method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the class has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 可加以覆寫，以實作設計工具樣板編輯動作變更時應該產生的功能。

span.span: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以實作方法，以執行額外處理，例如記錄已發生變更，當樣板編輯動作變更時。The method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.

para.span: 方法是抽象的並且必須被覆寫，當在衍生的類別繼承自類別。

span.span: The method is abstract and must be overridden when a derived class inherits from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 實作加入屬性和遮蔽屬性的 介面之集合。

span.span: A collection implementing an interface of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除屬性或新增屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，衍生自陰影對應的設計階段屬性設計工具實作，使用的各種控制項屬性，以將屬性新增至或從其中移除屬性的方法**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 控制項是衍生自類別，建立設計階段屬性，以遮蔽， ， ，和屬性。For controls that are derived from the class, the creates design-time properties to shadow the , , , and properties.

para.span: 覆寫方法，以將屬性新增至或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理程序。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
